content: vivaldi autumn mitts is the third pair in ***the four seasons*** collection it is widely believed that antonio vivaldi s inspiration for the four seasons stems from the time he spent as the court chapel master in the gorgeous countryside of mantua italy this is autumn the scent of woodsmoke curling from chimneys vibrant leaves turned ocher sienna burgundy crimson and gold a sense of quiet as they flutter and fall and the earth settles into a season of stillness darkness comes early beckoning us to turn inward and rest these mitts are sized for tiny smallish and larger hands using heavier yarn and larger needles the pattern is written for magic loop but can easily be adapted for dpns the lace portion is rhythmic intuitive easy to memorize and is written and charted vivaldi autumn mitts have been test knit in lieu of paying a fee for this pattern please consider making a donation to **world central kitchen** since 2010 world central kitchen has been providing meals to communities affected by conflict natural disasters and climate crisis all over the world https //wck org
